posts.title: Five tips for conducting an strong needfinding interview
posts.description: Needfinding interviews are the first step in building a product. Ideally, you do this before you write a line of code or draw a single screen of your spec. They can be incredibly valuable, presuming that they're structured well.

posts.title: Data: The first 'Manuscript Mates' hurdle
posts.description: Before I could begin with building Manuscript Mate, I needed to know if I could populate it. That proved to be tougher than expected.

posts.title: Hi, I have a blog now.
